section.title: WaveStar Infinity Monitoring
section.p: Each WaveStar Infinity system has a single consolidated Modbus Points List and a single consolidated SNMP MIB that are customized for the PDU’s configuration. They can be downloaded from the WaveStar Infinity Monitor on your PDU using a network attached browser with administrator privileges. Go the NETWORK screen and MODBUS or SNMP Tab.

section.title: WaveStar Monitoring:
section.p: Modbus Points lists for PDUs can be downloaded from the PDI website. Go to Service Software Downloads:

Select Modbus RTU Points List. A dialogue box for Modbus-RTU-Product-Points- List.zip opens. Open and unzip the file to show a directory list. Each PDU device has its own points list, listed below by directory and document name:

li.p: Color Monitor: \Wavestar Color Monitor PDU-RPP\FDI Color Touchscreen Points list.docx
PDU Board: \Wavestar M4G\M4G acquisition Points list-E.doc
Breaker IO: \Breaker IO\Breaker IO points list-rev1.doc

section.p: To download the SNMP MIB for the Color Monitor, PDU, subfeeds, and IO Breaker Board, go to Service Software Downloads:

Select SNMP Product Points List. Open the zip file SNMP-Product-MIB-Files.zip. The MIB for the Color Monitor contains a complete PDU MIB configuration. Select the directory Wavestar Color Monitor PDU-RPP, which contains the MIB “PDI FDI DISPLAY-14.mib”.

section.title: Manuals and Other Documentation for PDI Products
section.p: Installation and Operation manuals and other documentation for specific products can be downloaded from the product pages on the PDI website. Go to Products and select the appropriate Product Page:
